With a lot of difficulty, Magnus transformed. Having crashed into the
roadb=
lock had damaged him, but his transformation had twisted his left
leg.

Ult=
ra Magnus: Don't worry about me, take cover! I don't know why the
road is c=
losed, but one thing's for sure, we should have heard about
it if it was fo=
r a good reason. Cover me for a while, please.

He dragged himself off the =
way and sat down with his back to a building.

Ultra Magnus: Do you hear an=
ything or see anyone?
